title: Scope
body: The provisions of this chapter shall be used in conjunction with Chapters 6 through 13 and shall apply to the alteration, repair, addition and change of occupancy of existing structures, including historic and moved structures, as referenced in Section 301.1.2. The work performed on an existing building shall be classified in accordance with this chapter.

title: Compliance With Other Alternatives
body: Alterations, repairs, additions and changes of occupancy to existing structures shall comply with the provisions of Chapters 6 through 13 or with one of the alternatives provided in Section 301.1.

title: Work Area
body: The work area, as defined in Chapter 2, shall be identified on the construction documents.

title: Scope
body: Repairs, as defined in Chapter 2, include the patching or restoration or replacement of damaged materials, elements, equipment or fixtures for the purpose of maintaining such components in good or sound condition with respect to existing loads or performance requirements.

title: Application
body: Repairs shall comply with the provisions of Chapter 6.

title: Related Work
body: Work on nondamaged components that is necessary for the required repair of damaged components shall be considered part of the repair and shall not be subject to the provisions of Chapter 7, 8, 9, 10 or 11.

title: Scope
body: Level 1 alterations include the removal and replacement or the covering of existing materials, elements, equipment, or fixtures using new materials, elements, equipment, or fixtures that serve the same purpose.

title: Application
body: Level 1 alterations shall comply with the provisions of Chapter 7.

title: Scope
body: Level 2 alterations include the reconfiguration of space, the addition or elimination of any door or window, the reconfiguration or extension of any system, or the installation of any additional equipment.

title: Application
body: Level 2 alterations shall comply with the provisions of Chapter 7 for Level 1 alterations as well as the provisions of Chapter 8.

title: Scope
body: Level 3 alterations apply where the work area exceeds 50 percent of the building area.

title: Application
body: Level 3 alterations shall comply with the provisions of Chapters 7 and 8 for Level 1 and 2 alterations, respectively, as well as the provisions of Chapter 9.

title: Scope
body: Change of occupancy provisions apply where the activity is classified as a change of occupancy as defined in Chapter 2.

title: Application
body: Changes of occupancy shall comply with the provisions of Chapter 10.

title: Scope
body: Provisions for additions shall apply where work is classified as an addition as defined in Chapter 2.

title: Application
body: Additions to existing buildings shall comply with the provisions of Chapter 11.

title: Scope
body: Historic building provisions shall apply to buildings classified as historic as defined in Chapter 2.

title: Application
body: Except as specifically provided for in Chapter 12, historic buildings shall comply with applicable provisions of this code for the type of work being performed.

title: Scope
body: Relocated building provisions shall apply to relocated or moved buildings.

title: Application
body: Relocated buildings shall comply with the provisions of Chapter 13.
